snippet: Back home, attention has shifted elsewhere, but for soldiers at an Afghan outpost, the battle is a tough day-to-day reality.
abstract: Attention of most Americans has long since shifted from the war in Afghanistan, but in remote eastern Afghanistan near the Pakistan border, the battle is a tough day-to-day reality for American soldiers; they fight to keep one another alive in a war that has already been called off.
lead_paragraph: Back home, attention has shifted elsewhere, but for soldiers at an Afghan outpost, the battle is a tough day-to-day reality.
